definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: Remove thy way far from her, and come not nigh the door of her house
sentences.chinese: 你所行的道要離他遠，不可就近他的房門。

sentences.english: Rainwater is outlet naturally by conduits to the nearby rivers.
sentences.chinese: 過道路下的雨水管就近排入河道。

sentences.english: In general these two pins should be joined together and to the analog ground of the system.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這兩個引腳應該就近連接後再接模擬地。

sentences.english: Jane put one foot in the near stirrup and turned to look at the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 簡一隻腳就近蹬上馬鐙，轉臉看着陌生人。

sentences.english: Were the bodyguards so dumb they didn't know where is the closest hospital?
sentences.chinese: 難道哪那些隨扈不知到就近的醫院嗎？

sentences.english: The company has a large-scale group of after service, you may go to the one which is close to you.
sentences.chinese: 公司有龐大的售後服務隊伍您可以就近維修。

sentences.english: My girl friend enjoys traveling through the country hailing up at the nearest inn.
sentences.chinese: 我的女朋友喜歡鄉間旅行，夜宿就近的小旅店。

sentences.english: In the evening, we had a rest in a hotel after coming alongside the shore.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，我們攏岸後，就近找了一家旅店休息。

sentences.english: Let the sun liuhe town six leading the way into the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 讓孫六帶路進入了就近的小鎮六合鎮。

sentences.english: So they came forward and placed their feet on their necks.
sentences.chinese: 他們就近前來，把腳踏在這些王的頸項上。

sentences.english: Since students automatically went to neighborhood schools, schools did not have to compete for students.
sentences.chinese: 由於學生自動就近入學，故而學校並不爭奪生源。

sentences.english: Always have the ability to kill yourself nearby.
sentences.chinese: 一定要具備就近自裁的能力。

sentences.english: Suggest your nearby consults a person of the same trade, far hydrolyze not close thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 建議你就近請教同行，遠水解不了近渴。

sentences.english: The gas can then be funneled to a nearby generator.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，把氣體彙集到就近的一臺發電機。

sentences.english: The corpse of anyone who died from a quarantinable infectious disease must be cremated at a nearby place.
sentences.chinese: 因患檢疫傳染病而死亡的屍體，必須就近火化。

sentences.english: When the king came back from Damascus and saw the altar, he approached it and presented offerings on it.
sentences.chinese: 王從大馬色回來看見壇，就近前來，在壇上獻祭。

definition: to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
convenient/suitable/to facilitate/to make things easy/having money to spare/(euphemism) to relieve oneself

parts of the country other than where one is
